title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Watson Suspension Reaction, Dan Shaughnessy on Bill Russell Legacy, Pats OC Weirdness
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Watson Suspension Reaction, Dan Shaughnessy on Bill Russell Legacy, Pats OC Weirdness
description:
First, (3:00) Colin reacts to Deshaun Watson receiving a 6-game suspension from arbitrator Judge Sue Robinson, and if it’s in Roger Goodell’s best interest to appeal the decision and seek additional games.

Then, longtime Boston Globe Writer Dan Shaughnessy joins Colin to discuss the Watson suspension (10:00), react to the passing of Celtics legend Bill Russell (12:00), and look back on his rivalry with Wilt (16:00). They also attempt to explain why Bill Belichick looks poised to enter the season with Matt Patricia as OC (26:00), if New England is a playoff team (28:00), and if baseball peaked during the early 2000’s Yankees/Red Sox rivalry (30:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
